TEXT.TITLE: TENNECO <TGT> UNIT STARTS SERVING PPG <PPG>
TEXT.BODY: Tenneco Inc said its Tenngasco Corp subsidiary has started delivering up to 40 mln cubic feet per day of natural gas to PPG Industries Inc in Lake Charles, Louisiana, under a 10-year firm supply contract. Reuter
